alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:37PM MST until January 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, highest in upper elevations of the Park. * WHERE...Zion National Park and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: South Central Utah; Zion National Park
